name: Paramecia
description:
Infect, consume, destroy, and mutate your way to the top of the food chain.

As an aggressive alien microorganism, it is your goal to assimilate new organisms by infecting everything you touch.
Infect any paramecium that gets close to you, and defend yourself from enemies using the paramecia you have infected. Grow stronger by defeating enemies, and consume paramecia to unlock powerful new mutations that help you in your quest for dominance.

Controls
WASD                      -   Move
Mouse buttons   -   Rotate
